tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CustomerFeedbackSurvey (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    feedback_date DATE,
    survey_score INT,
    feedback_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE customer_feedback (
    feedback_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    satisfaction_rating INT,
    feedback_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE survey_data (
    survey_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    survey_question TEXT,
    survey_response TEXT,
    survey_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE SurveyData (
    survey_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    survey_question TEXT,
    survey_answer TEXT,
    survey_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE CustomerSatisfaction (
    satisfaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    survey_id INT,
    customer_id INT,
    satisfaction_level INT,
    satisfaction_date DATE
);
